title: Etude, optimisation et caractérisation spectrale d'une source Flash de rayonnement X pour le diagnostic de sprays denses
abstract: Results add to a growing literature demonstrating that intranasal administration of OT and AVP may have a more limited effect on social cognition, at both the behavioral and neural level, than initially assumed. Randomized controlled trial registrations: ClinicalTrials.gov; NCT02393443; NCT02393456; NCT02394054.
